titleInfo.title: Marriage license of Robert Thompson and Sarah Castleman in Davidson County, North Carolina.

subject.topic: Frontier migration/experiments in representative democracy, encounters with Native Americans .

mods.note: This marriage license for Robert Thompson and Sarah Castleman dates from the time when the land that is now Tennessee was part of North Carolina, before Tennessee became a state. The date has an interesting addition: "This 11th day of Apr. 1785 and 9th of our Independence."
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
